revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=NBG420N |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/18/2008 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=I88NBG420N |ic_id=2468C-NBG420N |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9130 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622ETP-5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ZyXEL |default_ssid_regex=^ZyXEL$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:19:CB |oui_eth=00:19:CB |default_ch= }} The '''ZyXEL''' logo, "45-401-000741", and "Made in Taiwan" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
[http://en.network01.net/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?topic_id=15&forum=2 Review and pictures]
Per the FCC label, the default SSID is '''ZyXEL'''.
Assumed 00:19:CB ('''ZyXEL''') OUI (in FCC manual, [http://www.zyxeltech.de/previews/nbg420n360amo3/rpSys.html on ZyXEL's interface simulator], [http://www.rrc.hu/ProdFiles/10920/NBG420N_1_1.pdf in this certification])
